reviews.sentence: Good for business travel. Stayed here for business and it was decent. Nice room nice bar with friendly attentive servers. Very nice front desk staff. Looks like some areas could use some updating but overall a nice average place. No valet or bell person but parking is free.

Hotel rooms need refurbishing. The Rooms are disappointing Beds are uncomfortable the meeting rooms are good. Staff is good and very helpful. I was disappointed as the rooms do not reflect what I have come to associate with the Hilton Brand. The rooms are clean but have a shabby appearance.

My stay Aug 26 to Sept 1 2015. My wife and I stayed at the Hilton due to extensive plumbing repairs at our nearby home. I have been a Hilton H Honors for about ten years. We were greatly impressed with friendly professional service of the enter Hilton staff from the front desk to housekeeping. A very special thanks to Nick Keith Terance Alonzo the bartenders and the ladies in the dinning room at breakfast. Regretfully we did not get everyones name but all are fondly remembered for making our stay so enjoyable. The staff made us feel special. We look forward to drop in for drinks and dinner. Ronald Gordon.

Excellent Hilton facility. I like the location near the Altamonte Mall and restaurants. Front desk people were friendly and helpful. The room was large but could use upgrading. Coffee in the lobby was convenient. Wi Fi worked well and the hotel has a lot of amenities like a gym and pool. Would stay again.

Disappointing Hilton. I normally stay at Hilton hotels. This was awful from check in to actual facilities. Digital room key did not work. Full house and one worker for check in. Arrived at midnight. In room at 130 am. One elevator broken. One other dirty cracked floor buttons. Looked like room had not been updated in 20 years. Scarred chipped doors and walls. Toilet would not work. Vending machines did not work and no restaurants open. 2 groups on long line had reserved adjoining rooms for parents and kids and were placed in separate floors. They could not get a refund for unused room due to booking on 3rd party website. do not stay here.

Staff was really nice. Beds were pret comfortable. Elevators were down and a couple of the maintenance men let us ride down the service elevator with them. Was a water main break so no ice machine. Issues were not hotels fault. Would stay again.

Avoid until renovations are completed. This hotel is in chaos due to renovations. Plumbing issues water leaks out of service elevators loud fans in the halls executive floor room reservations taken but not fulfilled. Front desk staff was very friendly and apologetic. Managerial staff not so much.

Horrible Stay during Renovations. Hotel staff is nice and are a victim to the situation. The hotel should either block off entirely the section under renovation or at least alert guests to the fact that renovations are underway before they reserve a room. Hopefully the quality of the hotel after renovations will be better than quality during renovation.

Not the worst hotel I ’ve stayed at. At least it ’s not the worst hotel I ’ve stayed atThis was hands down the worst Hilton I ’ve ever visited. Old dated and run down do not even begin to describe it. I do n’t think owners care. Let ’s start with the positive. It was clean for the most part and the people were friendly. It is also cheap and our room a king “ suite ” had a lot of space. This hotel has not been renovated in close to 30 years. It has an old heavy air vibe. See the pics. The hallways are dark the fixtures and furnishings look like they are from the 80 ’s popcorn ceilings old drapes low ceilings old wallpaper and a sofa bed that definitely is vintage and not in a good way. The ceiling lights in the bathroom have the old Florida grid cover. If you ever visited your grandmother in her 70 ’s era condo you ’l know what I mean. The A C was jet engine loud. That ’s not an exaggeration. When open the pull out sofa touches the bed in a way that makes it impossible to get out of the bed on one side. The doors to the rooms do n’t match. There was no hot water in the sink and the shower had two settings cold or scalding. Nothing in between. We checked in Friday. I noticed a pistachio shell on a window sill in the hall outside our room. It was there when we checked out on Sunday. The breakfast buffet was adequate. I do n’t think they were powered eggs but I ca n’t be sure. There are no a la carte options. Just the buffet. We are for free due to status but I would not have paid for it. The hotel is renovating the top two floors. I ’m sure they ’l look nice but this hotel should have been renovated more recently. Only reason I ’d stay here would be out of necessity as there are a lot of much better options in the Orlando area.
Great location close to everything great staff great room. HOTEL IS BEING UPGRADED MORE THAN 50 IS ALREADY DONE AND WE WERE PUT UP IN ONE OF THE REFURBISHED ROOMS.

Newly renovated rooms. I was hesitant to stay here because of the renovations but I was pleasantly surprised with our stay. We were given a renovated room and they were gorgeous. They are decorated in a modern style. The room is big so lots of space to stretch out. The two things I did not like about this was that the toilet kept refilling throughout the night so we had to close the door to the bathroom but you could still hear it because the doors are barn doors instead of hinged doors. Also we were in an adjoining room and the people next door to us were very loud. It sounded like they were having a party so I ended up having to call the front desk security about them. They were quieter but it was still loud so that kind of ruined our one night stay but that is not the hotels fault. I would definitely stay here again. The location is great. it is near a bunch of chain restaurants but you are just a short drive away from some good local places.

Will be nice when done. This hotel was undergoing some construction while I was there. I had a confirmation for a king size room. One was not available so they got off to a frustrating start for me. The two queen bed room was remodeled and clean. Seating was awful. There was the desk chair and a small chair crammed into the corner. Room was clean. Hallway was a mess. Front parking lot was low on lighting.
Wonderful friendly staff they were in the process of remodeling. when I was there so I will love to see how they make them better.
Great newly renovated room and super friendly staff.

Great Breakfast Buffet. First the hotel is wonderful recently renovated and great to be in. The Sunday breakfast brunch buffet is great. Many options to choose from and the setting is nice. Great service too. In the evenings they have a nice bar to visit good atmosphere to enjoy friends.

Ver my polite staff and clean hotel. I travel for business a couple times a month. The staff at this Hilton were very professional and polite. Rooms have been recently updated are very comfortable quiet and clean. Lots of plugs throughout for all your electronics.

Best Value in all of Orlando. I recently stayed at this hotel with my family for several days during the holidays and we were very impressed with the renovations and specially with the customer service. It is truly a great value in Orlando and we plan to go back next year. They have a resturant and bar and the rooms are very clean and spacious.

Newly Remodeled Nice Hotel. I had a very nice 2 night stay for a business conference. The hotel was recently remodeled so is beautifully updated. The bed was very comfortable and every staff member that I had contact with was friendly and welcoming. The hotel restaurant and Burger Bar both have great food. It is also in a good location that is easy to get to when traveling.
Friendly staff. Clean and updated amenities.
